sentences.en: [ Together ] That's ever been installed in every spacecraft on my hangar deck.
sentences.cn: 甚至每艘飞船上的万向节都是在我的机库甲板上安装的.

sentences.en: Hong Kong's first private - jet hangar opened in 1998 to no demand.
sentences.cn: 香港的首个私人飞机机库在1998年起用.

sentences.en: Inside the Kiev, the hangar bay is divided into two.
sentences.cn: 在基辅号内部, 机库被一分为二.

sentences.en: Issues with hangar roles and container configurations have been resolved.
sentences.cn: 1个机库规则和容器设置的问题被解决.

sentences.en: Medium or large ship: has hangar? Hangar entrances well positioned? Interior layout good?
sentences.cn: 中型或大型船: 有机库? 机库的进口摆放的正确? 内部布局好了?

sentences.en: Please expedite your taxiing and proceeding to the hangar direct.
sentences.cn: 请加大滑行速度,直接滑到机库.

sentences.en: Remember that the polycount includes the interior ( hangar ).
sentences.cn: 多边形数包括空间站内部结构 ( 如机库 ) 的多边形数.

sentences.en: Senator McCain and the former president came together in a hangar at Houston's Hobby airport and stood side by side with their wives as the 41st president offered his endorsement.
sentences.cn: 参议员麦凯恩和前总统布什携他们的妻子一起出现在休斯敦机场的一个飞机库中。 第41届总统宣布他将支持麦克恩选举。

sentences.en: Stay on my wing! Head for the command ship's hangar.
sentences.cn: 呆在我的机翼上! 前往指挥舰的修理库.

sentences.en: The airport hangar was freshly painted.
sentences.cn: 机场的飞机库是新油漆过的.

sentences.en: The bigger the hangar, the more fake doors you should use.
sentences.cn: 至于更大的机库, 你要使用更多的假门.

sentences.en: The flying - off platform was to be provided on the roof of the hangar.
sentences.cn: 机库的顶篷是飞行甲板.

sentences.en: The plane nosed into the hangar.
The plane stopped in that big hangar.
sentences.cn: 飞机停在那个大机库里.

sentences.en: Uh , we're in the main hangar across from the ship.
sentences.cn: 我们在主机棚,宇宙飞船!

sentences.en: Walls on either side of the structure, making it resemble an aircraft hangar, will help isolate debris.
sentences.cn: 与飞机库相似，这座建筑的墙在其两端。这两面墙会帮助隔离废墟。

sentences.en: Welcome back, Icarus. You're clear to dock in Hangar Bay 2.
sentences.cn: 欢迎回来, “伊卡洛斯”号. 你获许在船库2号湾进坞.

trans.tran_en: a very large building in which aircraft are kept
